KIRUNDO Women's Two Piece Outfits Business Casual Cropped Blazer Jackets and Wide Leg Pants Suit Sets Work Clothes  Pretty Nice Business Casual  This is a decent set and it actually fits as described (I'm an XL, 16 top and 18 bottom, 5'7"). I got it as a potential interview outfit, but I didn't love the look on me even though it fit well. The fabric is somewhat thin, which is nice since it isn't stiff, but it also seems on the thin side for a structured outfit like this. The style is kind of a throwback to the 90s, but the fabric would have been much more substantial at the time (I know because I was there!). So overall, it fits as advertised and comes in a nice variety of colors, so it may be just right for you.

I qctually made a note to myself to remind me to take the time to provide feedback on this amazing 2pc suit.  I am 5'6, 125lbs. I ordered size S and it fits perfectly. I am a bit top heavy but only because I'm lite at the bottom!  Often times, I will "take a chance"  and order something that is priced very reasonably - will the full intention of taking it to my sewing machine or more accurately, taking my sewing machine to it, for alterations.  I'm typically not a fan of wide or flare legs. With this suit, I thought I might need to make a dressy short set. BUT, no need! I know most of that is a personal preference but the point is that the cut of the fabic is precise, no lumpy areas, not long or short cut on the inseam. The fabric is of quality, the color is a genuine navy and the pleats and seams lay flat as they should. Everything about the two peices, far exceeded my expectations!  Highly recommended!
100% I'm going to order one more this time different color, the material it's high quality and looks very very elegant and cool, great products fast shipping good price

The color of this outfit is as great as the quality fabric it is made from! Putting this on makes you feel like the boss you are inside, outside! The pants are a bit long, so if you are short like me, I recommend getting some shoes that lift you a bit, or getting it tailored to fit your height. It is a 2 piece - just the jacket and pants! So be sure to purchase something to go underneath the jacket unless you already posses a top that compliments it. I was truly impressed! It is made out of heavier, thicker, quality fabric making you feel like you are in an expensive suit. Also it comes true to size . I am a medium, and it fit well!

This set was ordered in the small navy blue. The jacket fits perfectly not being too large while also leaving a loose feel to it. The pants fit well not having a lot of sagging in the front nor back. They are a loose fit pair of pants but they are put together well enough to leave you looking classy for a presentation or speakers conference. The quality of it is nicely made. It doesn't look high end but it also doesn't look very cheap. I would order another set.
